seed_pair.target: 和你一起工作的那个人。

practice_phrases: With you.
和你一起。
I work with you.
我和你一起工作。
I want to travel with you.
我想和你一起旅行。
I agreed with you a moment ago.
我刚才同意你。
Did you want to follow with you?
你想跟着和你一起吗？
I asked if he wanted to work with you.
我问他是否想和你一起工作。
I didn't ask if she wanted to travel with you.
我没问她是否想和你一起旅行。
Yes, I want to go traveling with you to Africa.
是的，我想和你一起去非洲旅行。
That person wants to work with you in the garden.
那个人想和你一起在花园里工作。
Did you ask if that person wanted to travel with you last year?
你问那个人是否想去年和你一起旅行了吗？
The person who works together.
一起工作的人。
That person who works together.
一起工作的那个人。
The person who works together with you.
和你一起工作的人。
I asked about the person who works together.
我问关于一起工作的人。
That person who works together with you is right.
和你一起工作的那个人对。
I agreed with the person who works together with you.
我同意和你一起工作的人。
Did you ask that person who works together with you?
你问和你一起工作的那个人了吗？
I didn't agree with that person who works together with you.
我不同意和你一起工作的那个人。
Yes, I asked if that person who works together wanted to travel.
是的，我问一起工作的那个人是否想旅行。
That person who works together with you said that a moment ago.
和你一起工作的那个人刚才说了那个。
That person.
那个人。
That person is right.
那个人对。
I asked that person.
我问那个人。
I agreed with that person a moment ago.
我刚才同意那个人。
Did you ask that person about the garden?
你问那个人关于花园了吗？
That person wanted to travel to Africa last year.
那个人去年想去非洲旅行。
I didn't agree with that person who works together with you.
我不同意和你一起工作的那个人。
Yes, I asked that person if he wanted to work with you.
是的，我问那个人是否想和你一起工作。
That person said he couldn't agree with what you said a moment ago.
那个人说他不能同意你刚才说的话。
That person you work with.
和你一起工作的那个人。
